responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "FE68526848BFF3A73C29B39773F55B16", "\"According to my calculations, you should be reading this in the Riverlands during the Second Age. If so, Carphin shines as a city of supreme mastery of essence. In order to make the modifications to my sphere I require a rare tome called, \"Tinmyzr\'s Tome of Applied Magic and Mechanarcana.\" And since you are there, pick up a copy of \"The Condensed Codex of Verran History\" and \"The Kyronic Code of Mending.\" Place these in the receptacle of the Codex and I shall reward you.\"")
name: MIDD_0015_AOF_ClockworkCodex_10
